entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
